title: Game abandoned BUG !!!
body:
I Played a rank game a couple of hours ago, we won the game ended skipped the stats, trying to duo with a friend an error keeps popping up so i relogged, I logged back in GAME ABANDONED pops up says i have to reconnect, pressed reconnect nothing happens. Google'd the problem it says its a GHOST GAME, its been more than 4 hrs now still have the bug. 

Someone please help me fix this problem, I've literally done everything and nothing worked -_-

All response are appreciated 

Thank you

replies.body:
A lot of people seem to have been getting this around the introduction of the most recent patch.

Unfortunately it usually means that game won't be marked as "won" on your account.
